Class Loan

java.lang.Object
  Loan
Direct Known Subclasses:
LongLoan, ShortLoan
public class Loan
extends java.lang.Object

The Loan class contains details about a borrowed Item, including the borrower, Item information, issue date, and due date.

Author:
C
